definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: A axle of blast furnace charging wagon broke in use.
sentences.chinese: 高爐上料車車軸在使用過程中發生斷裂。

sentences.english: Remove the upper suspension arm nut and bolt at the axle bracket.
sentences.chinese: 從車軸支架上拆去上端懸吊臂螺帽和螺栓。

sentences.english: The pothole fractured a bolt on the axle.
sentences.chinese: 壺穴使車軸上的一隻螺釘破碎。

sentences.english: He had to repair the wagon, grease the axles .
sentences.chinese: 他得去修理大車，給車軸塗油。

sentences.english: Front axles are connected directly to the transaxle and provide power to the front wheels.
sentences.chinese: 前車軸是直接連接到跨橋和提供電力的前輪。

sentences.english: Axle is one of the important parts of railway vehicles dealing transportation safety.
sentences.chinese: 車軸是直接關係鐵道車輛運營安全的重要部件之一。

sentences.english: Remove nuts, U-bolts and spring bracket from axle.
sentences.chinese: 由車軸拆下螺帽，U型螺栓和彈簧支架。

sentences.english: The present invention also discloses the quality control method of red clover herb.
sentences.chinese: 本發明還公開了紅車軸草質量控制方法。

sentences.english: Experimental study is performed on the probability-based cyclic constitution models for LZ50 axle steel.
sentences.chinese: 試驗研究了LZ50車軸鋼隨機循環本構模型。

sentences.english: Biosystematics of Trifolium pratense L. in the east mountains in Heilongjiang Province, China.
sentences.chinese: 黑龍江省東部山區紅車軸草種內變異類型的研究。

sentences.english: Disconnect stabilizer bar links at the axle.
sentences.chinese: 斷開車軸上穩定杆連桿。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo identify the optimal harvest time for maximal contents of isoflavones in Trifolium Pratense.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲確定紅車軸草最佳採收期提供依據。

sentences.english: The axles are all made of bronze.
sentences.chinese: 它們的車軸啊都是用青銅製作的。

sentences.english: This paper reviews the composition and main physiological functions of isoflavone in Trifolium pratense.
sentences.chinese: 對紅車軸草異黃酮的組成及主要生理功能進行了綜述。

sentences.english: He asked the worker to grease the axile.
sentences.chinese: 他讓這個工人給車軸塗些機油。

definition: waistband of a skirt/(fig.) related to the wife or another female family member
made of steel/steel (bar, screw, product etc)
